Pre-Game Insights: France have the quality and experience to come out on top.
Les Bleus have the quality to do damage at the other end with Mbappe leading the charge.
France have not been at their best so far, but they have the quality and experience to come out on top.
Miscellaneous Highlights: France have reached the final in three of their last four appearances at the World Cup and the European Championship.
Belgium do not currently look like potential winners in their first tournament post-golden generation.
Goals could be few and far between in this one.
Others: France will stick with their tried-and-trusted 4-3-3 formation, with Antoine Griezmann and Marcus Thuram set to be restored to the XI.
Belgium are the likelier of the two teams to make changes, but we should not expect a complete reshuffle from Tedesco.
